data.description:
Let's Plane is an elegant puzzle and adventure game where players master and adapt to the highly realistic characteristics of paper airplanes, constantly solving brain burning levels, encountering various challenging interference props, and finally unlocking various paper airplanes and folding methods to break through virtual reality and enjoy flying with friends and children in reality. At the same time, there is a fierce global ranking waiting for you to compete. Let's play!
Game features:
-Competing on global and friend leaderboards
-Realistic paper aircraft with 5 different characteristics
-Video tutorial on folding 5 types of paper airplanes
-The Perfect Challenge of Three Star Clearance
-Dozens of achievements waiting for you to achieve

I hope this game can make you guys and your friends and family have fun!

changelog.change_log:
Ver1.1 updated

1. Add CHALLENGE MODE that allows you to earn extra STARS while also challenging World Records with all the players in the world .

Distance Challenge - Fly as far as you can!
Height Challenge - fly as high as you can!
Speed Challenge - Fly as fast as you can!
Balloon Challenge - Hit as more as you can！

2. We have adjusted the difficulty of several levels

3. Add A new special plane

4. Fixed some bugs.

Hope you pilots enjoy it! have fun!

^________^
